message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it's only fair to present this opportunity at a price reflecting its true value and your perceived worth to us. We're extending an offer of $950,000 for the product.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, $950,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After evaluating your proposal, we've decided to counter with a price of $900,000 for the product. We hope this aligns more closely with what you're willing to pay and brings us closer to reaching an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $900,000 is still a bit higher than I can comfortably go right now.  Let's meet in the middle. I'm prepared to offer $875,000 for the product. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product and my budget. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, thank you for your continued interest in our product. After careful consideration, we've decided to counter your offer with $890,000. We believe this price reflects the value of the product while remaining competitive within your budget. We hope this proposal helps us reach an agreement.
